author: chetanm
msg: Implemented AdvanceFulltextQueryIndex. The cost calculation is currently done in a naive way where it sets the number of entries to 0 and then provide a cost per execution thus effective cost is same as the one returned earlier.
Also moved getRelativePaths with no change in its logic
